description: This file defines a QuizPage component for a LightningJS-based quiz application frontend. It manages displaying questions, options, managing selection states, and navigating to results.

classes.name: Component
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing the quiz page, handling question display, option selection, and navigation.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the current question and resets options backgrounds and selection.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Sets the selected option and updates option background colors accordingly.

methods.name: next
methods.description: Advances to the next question, updates score if answered correctly, or navigates to results if quiz ends.

calls: navigate('/results', { state: { score: this.$state.score, total: quiz.length } })
